title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 326.4 - Commercial permit applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 326.4 - Commercial permit applications

State Regulations
(a) An application for a commercial permit shall be submitted to an agent or office
designated by the commissioner. Such application shall be made in a manner and
on a form prescribed by the commissioner and shall include such information, statements or certification as the commissioner shall require. (b) Upon receipt of an application, the
commissioner shall: (1)
examine the
application; and
(2)
issue the
commercial permit requested therein, imposing whatever restrictions or
conditions on the permit he deems appropriate in order to protect the public
interest; or
(3)
refuse to issue
the commercial permit requested therein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
326.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
